p={131,1,129,7,5,133,142,141,13}
pal(p,1)

function new_object(c)
	obj={}
	-- origin point, new origin point
	obj.op={x=64,y=64}
	obj.nop={x=64,y=64}
	obj.t=0
	obj.tv=0.0015
	obj.c=c
	obj.rv=0.0015
	obj.rc=rnd(1)
	obj.r=3+((1+sin(obj.rc))/2)*60
	
	obj.draw=function(self)
		circ(self.op.x,self.op.y,self.r,self.c)
	end
	
	obj.update=function(self)
		-- new pos every 4 secs
		if t()%4==0 then
			if self.t<5 then
				self:new_origin()
			else
				-- set pos @ origin
				self.nop={x=64,y=64}
				-- stay @ origin for 4 cycles
				if self.t>=10 then
					self.t=0
				end
			end
			self.t+=1
		end
		self:move()
		self:resize()
	end
	
	obj.resize=function(self)
		self.r=3+((1+cos(self.rc))/2)*60
		self.rc+=self.rv
	end
	
	obj.move=function(self)
		x_dif=(self.nop.x-self.op.x)/20
		y_dif=(self.nop.y-self.op.y)/20
		
		self.op.x+=x_dif
		self.op.y+=y_dif
	end
	
	obj.new_origin=function(self)
		new_x=30+rnd(68)\1
		new_y=30+rnd(68)\1
		self.nop={x=new_x,y=new_y}
	end
	
	return obj
end

function got_n(x,y)
	-- got neighbors()
	--
	-- get cur pixl color from
	-- 	r,l,u,d
	-- return (all are 0)
	r=pget(x+1,y)
	l=pget(x-1,y)
	u=pget(x,y+1)
	d=pget(x,y-1)
	return r==0 and l==0
				and l==0 and d==0
end

function burn()
	for i=1,1000 do
		x=rnd(128)
		y=rnd(128)\1
		pc=pget(x,y)
		res=got_n(x,y)
		if rnd(1)<.8 or res then
			if rnd(1)<.45 and
						(pc!=0 and pc%3!=0) then
				pset(x,y,pc+1)
				pset(x,y-2,pc+1)
				pset(x,y+2,pc+1)
				pset(x+2,y,pc+1)
				pset(x+2,y,pc+1)
			else
				pset(x,y,0)
			end
		end
	end
end

function quick_burn()
	for i=1,5 do
		burn()
	end
end

objs={}
for i=1,9 do
	if i<4 then
		i=1
	elseif i<7 then
		i=4
	else
		i=7
	end
	add(objs,new_object(i))
end

cls()
_set_fps(60)
quick_burn()
::♥::
if t()<2 then
	print("1992",56,64,2)
	print("loading screen",36,70,2)
else
	for o in all(objs) do
		o:draw()
		o:update()
	end
	burn()
	flip()
end
goto ♥
